RETAIL SPACE

UNIT 102

Looking for a great opportunity to open a small retail store? This 484 square foot space is the perfect step on a burgeoning Foster Rd. With lots of daily foot traffic, hardwoods throughout, and floor to ceiling windows on the storefront, it's set for success.

Offers a shared kitchenette and restrooms with the other two units in the building.

Address

5338 SE Foster Rd
Portland, OR 97215

Phone
